mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product_master (nm, product_code, rdt, icpu, igpu, ram, size, weight, brand, os, battery, istwoinone, hz, resolution, img) VALUES (#{nm}, #{product_code}, #{rdt}, ${icpu}, ${igpu}, ${ram}, ${size}, ${weight}, #{brand}, #{os}, ${battery}, #{istwoinone}, ${hz}, #{resolution}, #{img})
INSERT INTO t_product_detail (iproduct, color, hdd, ssd, price, stock, isrep, dc_rate, img) VALUES (${iproduct}, #{color}, ${hdd}, ${ssd}, ${price}, ${stock}, #{isrep}, ${dc_rate}, #{img})

mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.iproduct) AS num , A.iproduct, A.nm, A.product_code,A.brand, B.img, B.price, B.idetail, C.stock, F.master_total, IFNULL(J.month_total,0) AS month_total, ifnull(K.rating,0) AS rating , ifnull(K.ratingCount,0) AS ratingCount FROM t_product_master A INNER JOIN t_product_detail B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct INNER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(stock) AS stock,iproduct FROM t_product_detail GROUP BY iproduct )C ON C.iproduct = A.iproduct INNER JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(SUM(result_price), 0) AS master_total, D.iproduct FROM t_product_detail D LEFT JOIN t_order_product E ON D.idetail = E.idetail WHERE D.iproduct GROUP BY D.iproduct ) F ON F.iproduct = A.iproduct LEFT JOIN( SELECT SUM(H.result_price) AS month_total, G.iproduct FROM t_product_detail G INNER JOIN t_order_product H ON G.idetail = H.idetail INNER JOIN t_order I ON H.iorder = I.iorder WHERE I.rdt BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -3 MONTH) AND NOW() AND G.iproduct GROUP BY G.iproduct ) J ON J.iproduct = A.iproduct LEFT JOIN( SELECT ROUND(AVG(rating), 1) AS rating, COUNT(iuser) AS ratingCount, iproduct FROM t_product_review GROUP BY iproduct ) K ON A.iproduct = K.iproduct
ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${recordCount} ) AS t
SELECT CEIL((count(A.iproduct)) / ${recordCount}) AS result FROM t_product_master A INNER JOIN t_product_detail B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct

SELECT A.rdt, B.price , B.ssd, B.hdd, B.color, B.stock, C.nm, D.nm,G.detail_total,IFNULL(K.detail_month_total,0),B.img , B.idetail FROM t_product_master A INNER JOIN t_product_detail B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct INNER JOIN t_product_cpu C ON A.icpu = C.icpu INNER JOIN t_product_gpu D ON A.igpu = D.igpu INNER JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(F.result_price),0) AS detail_total, E.idetail FROM t_product_detail E LEFT JOIN t_order_product F ON E.idetail = F.idetail WHERE E.iproduct GROUP BY E.idetail ) G ON B.idetail = G.idetail LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(I.result_price) AS detail_month_total, H.idetail FROM t_product_detail H LEFT JOIN t_order_product I ON H.idetail = I.idetail LEFT JOIN t_order J ON I.iorder = J.iorder WHERE J.rdt BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -3 MONTH) AND NOW() AND H.iproduct GROUP BY H.idetail ) K ON B.idetail = K.idetail WHERE A.iproduct = ${iproduct} GROUP BY B.idetail ORDER BY isrep DESC;

SELECT A.product_code, A.nm, A.rdt, A.brand, A.ram, A.size, A.weight, A.os, B.idetail, C.nm AS cpu, D.nm AS gpu, B.img, A.iproduct, A.hz, A.battery, A.istwoinone, A.resolution, G.total_price, IFNULL(K.month_total,0),A.icpu,A.igpu FROM t_product_master A INNER JOIN t_product_detail B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct INNER JOIN t_product_cpu C ON A.icpu = C.icpu INNER JOIN t_product_gpu D ON A.igpu = D.igpu INNER JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(F.result_price),0) AS total_price, E.iproduct FROM t_product_detail E LEFT JOIN t_order_product F ON E.idetail = F.idetail WHERE E.iproduct = ${iproduct} )G ON A.iproduct = G.iproduct LEFT JOIN( SELECT SUM(I.result_price) AS month_total,H.iproduct FROM t_product_detail H LEFT JOIN t_order_product I ON H.idetail = I.idetail LEFT JOIN t_order J ON I.iorder = J.iorder WHERE J.rdt BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -3 MONTH) AND NOW() AND H.iproduct GROUP BY H.iproduct ) K ON K.iproduct = A.iproduct WHERE B.isrep = 'Y' AND A.iproduct = ${iproduct};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM a,b USING t_product_master AS a LEFT JOIN t_product_detail AS b ON a.iproduct = b.iproduct WHERE b.iproduct = ${iproduct};
mapper.update: UPDATE t_product_master A INNER JOIN t_product_detail B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct INNER JOIN t_product_cpu C ON A.icpu = C.icpu INNER JOIN t_product_gpu D ON A.igpu = D.igpu SET A.product_code=#{product_code}, A.nm=#{nm}, A.rdt=#{rdt} , A.ram=${ram}, A.size=${size}, A.icpu=${icpu}, A.igpu=${igpu}, A.weight=${weight}, A.os=#{os}, A.hz=#{hz}, A.istwoinone=#{istwoinone}, A.battery=${battery}, A.resolution=#{resolution} WHERE A.iproduct = ${iproduct}
